languages.text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability — {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Blade Dance{/g}, which makes several melee attacks against nearby targets chosen at random.

traits.locale_text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability — {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Blade Dance{/g}, which makes several melee attacks against nearby targets chosen at random.

languages.text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

traits.locale_text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Blade Dance{/g}. That ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

languages.text: Танцоры смерти виртуозно владеют мечом и сокрушают противника, нанося серии стремительных ударов с помощью своей ключевой способности {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Танец клинков{/g}. Она позволяет несколько раз атаковать в ближнем бою случайные цели на соседних клетках.
languages.original_text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

traits.locale_text: Танцоры смерти виртуозно владеют мечом и сокрушают противника, нанося серии стремительных ударов с помощью своей ключевой способности {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Танец клинков{/g}. Она позволяет несколько раз атаковать в ближнем бою случайные цели на соседних клетках.

Танцоры смерти виртуозно владеют мечом и сокрушают противника, нанося серии стремительных ударов с помощью своей ключевой способности {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Танец клинков{/g}. Она позволяет несколько раз атаковать в ближнем бою случайные цели на соседних клетках.

languages.text: Les danselames sont des virtuoses de l'épée, vifs et meurtriers. Ils sont capables de lancer toute une série d'attaques rapides avec leur capacité clé, {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danse des lames{/g}, qui permet de porter plusieurs attaques de mêlée contre des cibles adjacentes aléatoires.
languages.original_text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

traits.locale_text: Les danselames sont des virtuoses de l'épée, vifs et meurtriers. Ils sont capables de lancer toute une série d'attaques rapides avec leur capacité clé, {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Danse des Lames{/g}, qui permet de porter plusieurs attaques de mêlée contre des cibles adjacentes aléatoires.

Les danselames sont des virtuoses de l'épée, vifs et meurtriers. Ils sont capables de lancer toute une série d'attaques rapides avec leur capacité clé, {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Danse des Lames{/g}, qui permet de porter plusieurs attaques de mêlée contre des cibles adjacentes aléatoires.

languages.text: Klingenmeister sind flinke und tödliche Meister des Schwertes, die mit ihrer Grundstein-Fähigkeit {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Klingentanz{/g} auf eine schnelle Abfolge von Hieben spezialisiert sind. Diese Fähigkeit ermöglicht Klingentänzern mehrere Nahkampfangriffe auf zufällige Ziele auf angrenzenden Zellen.
languages.original_text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

traits.locale_text: Klingenmeister sind flinke und tödliche Meister des Schwertes, die mit ihrer Grundstein-Fähigkeit {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Klingentanz{/g} auf eine schnelle Abfolge von Hieben spezialisiert sind. Diese Fähigkeit ermöglicht Klingentänzern mehrere Nahkampfangriffe auf zufällige Ziele auf angrenzenden Zellen.

languages.text: Los hojas danzantes son maestros de la espada rápidos y letales que se especializan en lanzar ráfagas de golpes rápidos con su capacidad clave {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danza de espada{/g}. Esta capacidad permite que el hoja danzante realice varios golpes cuerpo a cuerpo contra objetivos adyacentes aleatorios.
languages.original_text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

traits.locale_text: Los hojas danzantes son maestros de la espada rápidos y letales que se especializan en lanzar ráfagas de golpes rápidos con su capacidad clave {g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}Danza de espada{/g}. Esta capacidad permite que el hoja danzante realice varios golpes cuerpo a cuerpo contra objetivos adyacentes aleatorios.

languages.text: ブレードダンサーは、剣の達人であり、その重要なアビリティ{g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}ブレード・ダンス{/g}を使って素早く、致命的な連続攻撃を繰り出すことを得意とする。このアビリティにより、ブレードダンサーは隣接するランダムな対象に対して複数の近接攻撃を行うことができる。
languages.original_text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

traits.locale_text: ブレードダンサーは、剣の達人であり、その重要なアビリティ{g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}ブレード・ダンス{/g}を使って素早く、致命的な連続攻撃を繰り出すことを得意とする。このアビリティにより、ブレードダンサーは隣接するランダムな対象に対して複数の近接攻撃を行うことができる。

languages.text: 刀锋舞者是敏捷而致命的刀剑大师，擅长发动一系列快速攻击。刀锋舞者的关键能力为{g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}利刃之舞{/g}，可以对随机邻近目标进行多次近战攻击。
languages.original_text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.

traits.locale_text: 刀锋舞者是敏捷而致命的刀剑大师，擅长发动一系列快速攻击。刀锋舞者的关键能力为{g|f:dd6948ee596346a69733d0bb107c2f42}利刃之舞{/g}，可以对随机邻近目标进行多次近战攻击。

languages.text: Kılıç Dansçıları; kilit kabiliyetleri {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Kılıç Dansı{/g} ile art arda şimşek gibi saldırılar yapabilmekte uzmanlaşan, kılıcın süratli ve ölümcül ustalarıdır. Bu kabiliyet, Kılıç Dansçısı'nın birbirine bitişik rastgele hedeflere birden fazla yakın dövüş atağı yapabilmesini sağlar.
languages.original_text: Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes with their keystone ability {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}. This ability allows the Bladedancer to make several melee strikes against random adjacent targets.
